title: La Vuelta a España 2021 Standings after Stage 8
content:
General Classification / Red Jersey 

Stage 8 of the Vuelta a España had a minimal impact on the general classification, meaning the top ten is unchanged. Primož Roglič holds the lead of the race, whilst Felix Großschartner and Enric Mas are the only two riders within 30 seconds.

1. Primož Roglič
2. Felix Großschartner +0:08
3. Enric Mas +0:25
4. Miguel Angel Lopez +0:36
5. Jan Polanc +0:38
6. Egan Bernal +0:41
7. Jack Haig +0:57
8. Sep Kuss +0:59
9. Aleksandr Vlasov +1:06
10. Adam Yates +1:22

La Vuelta a Espana 2021: Route, Predictions and Contenders

Points Classification

1. Fabio Jakobsen - 180 points
2. Jasper Philipsen - 164 points
3. Arnaud Démare - 74 points
4. Alberto Dainese - 73 points
5. Michael Matthews - 70 points

La Vuelta Stage 9 Preview

King of the Mountains Classification

1. Pavel Sivakov - 16 points
2. Michael Storer - 12 points
3. Jack Haig - 11 points
4. Romain Bardet - 11 points
5. Rein Taaramae - 10 points

Young Rider's Classification

1. Egan Bernal
2. Aleksandr Vlasov + 0:25
3. Gino Mäder +2:11
4. Juan Pedro Lopez +2:22
5. Clément Champoussin +4:54

Team Classification

1. Movistar Team
2. Ineos Grenadiers +2:10
3. Bahrian - Victorious +4:19
4. UAE Team Emirates +4:26
5. Jumbo Visma +7:41

author: Peter Stuart
